blockdesc-t_four_sprinkler-*: Made for the most dedicated sprinkler enyjoyers
game:sprinklersmod-quickstart-text: The Sprinklers Mod allows crafting of Sprinklers which allow for automatic watering of acres. These Sprinklers will periodically water all nearby farmland blocks in an (configurable) interval. For them to be able to do this, they need to be filled with water from a watering can. The tooltip will show the current amount of stored water. If water is filled up and the average moisture of the surrounding farmland is smaller than 80%, the sprinkler will activate and consume some of its water to add 5% moisture to each block. This will happen until the 80% threshold is reached. A small warning: The continual search for waterable blocks in the Sprinklers range might cause performance issue. Use this mod with caution. There are 4 types of sprinklers: Tier-1-Sprinkler - 2 Blocks Radius, 20 Liter Tank Tier-2-Sprinkler - 4 Blocks Radius, 40 Liter Tank Tier-3-Sprinkler - 6 Blocks Radius, 60 Liter Tank Tier-4-Sprinkler - 8 Blocks Radius, 100 Liter Tank Each Sprinkler tier also comes in variations of copper, all bronze types, brass and lead. Config Parameteres: tXSprinklerRange => Determines the watering radius for the corresponding Sprinkler type tXSprinklerVolume => Determines the tank size for the corresponding Sprinkler type. Formula: 0,1 Liters * volume waterConsumption => Multiplies the water consumption per activation. Formula: 0,1 Liters * waterConsumption minIntervalInMillis => Defines a base value for how often (in milliseconds) the Sprinklers should activate. To prevent lag, each Sprinkler will be added up to 5 seconds of delay on top of this value.
